m_szDocSumamry: Umicore: Recycling And Clean Tech Can Pay Dividends Feb.  2, 2016  8:38 PM ET | Former miner Umicore is now a champion in recycling and clean tech. Megatrends like electric vehicles, clean air and resource scarcity promise a bright future for Umicore. The company has a choppy dividend growth track record, but no cuts since 1997. With a market cap of $4.03 billion, Umicore ( OTCPK:UMICF / OTCPK:UMICY ) is the largest materials technology group from Belgium.
